kamaza.name: Mana Drain
kamaza.description: Fires a bolt of siphoning blue energy that drains mana from the target
kamaza.cast_message: {caster} fires a siphoning bolt of blue energy at {target}!
kamaza.hit_message: The bolt leeches magical energy, draining mana and dealing {damage} force damage!

yilazi.name: Vampiric Touch
yilazi.description: Fires a bolt of crimson energy that drains life force from the target
yilazi.cast_message: {caster} fires a bolt of crimson energy, draining {target}'s life force!
yilazi.hit_message: Life energy is torn away, dealing {damage} damage and healing {caster}!

igadani.name: Curse of Weakness
igadani.description: Casts a curse that drains the target's agility, reducing their dexterity
igadani.cast_message: {caster} casts a withering curse, sapping {target}'s agility!
igadani.hit_message: The curse drains agility and deals {damage} necrotic damage!

rodani.name: Wither
rodani.description: Casts a withering curse that drains the target's physique and constitution
rodani.cast_message: {caster} casts a withering curse, weakening {target}'s body!
rodani.hit_message: The curse saps physical vitality and deals {damage} necrotic damage!

tsudani.name: Enervation
tsudani.description: Casts a draining curse that saps the target's stamina and vitality
tsudani.hit_message: The curse drains stamina and deals {damage} necrotic damage!

kamazadaku.name: Mana Burn
kamazadaku.description: Summons a storm of siphoning energy that drains mana from all enemies
kamazadaku.cast_message: {caster} summons a storm of siphoning blue energy!
kamazadaku.hit_message: The storm drains magical energy from all foes for {damage} damage!

jinasudani.name: Feeblemind
jinasudani.description: Casts a devastating curse that ravages the target's mind and mental faculties
jinasudani.cast_message: {caster} casts a devastating curse, ravaging {target}'s mind!
jinasudani.hit_message: The curse shatters mental fortitude and deals {damage} psychic damage!

poradani.name: Finger of Death
poradani.description: Casts a devastating curse that withers the target's body and physical strength
poradani.cast_message: {caster} casts a devastating curse, withering {target}'s body!
poradani.hit_message: The curse withers physical strength and deals {damage} necrotic damage!

takumaru.name: Paralyzing Touch
takumaru.description: Fires a bolt of dark violet energy that paralyzes the target's body
takumaru.cast_message: {caster} fires a bolt of paralyzing dark violet energy at {target}!
takumaru.hit_message: {target} is paralyzed by dark magic, taking {damage} force damage!

takumarudaku.name: Mass Paralysis
takumarudaku.description: Unleashes a wave of dark violet energy that paralyzes all enemies in the area
takumarudaku.cast_message: {caster} unleashes a wave of paralyzing dark energy!
takumarudaku.hit_message: All enemies are frozen by dark magic for {damage} force damage!

raise_dead.name: Raise Dead
raise_dead.description: Animates undead creatures from beyond the grave to serve the necromancer
raise_dead.cast_message: {caster} chants forbidden words, raising the dead!
raise_dead.hit_message: {mob_prefix} {mob_name} rises from the earth, animated by dark magic!
